subs.text: Poll: If you have a college degree, how was it paid for?
Poll: A question for developers and users of feed readers.

If you were part of the Frontier, Radio UserLand or Drummer communities and are interested in helping test my new feed reading product, let me know. You can send an email to the address on the about page. You have to have done a fair amount of work with RSS, and can write a decent bug report. This is an ambitious product. Want to solve big problems? We do too! :boom:
Calling a person toxic is really bad.
It's the kind of thing people who run death camps say about the people they put in death camps.
It's a trigger for me -- as a child of Holocaust survivors.
There aren't many insults I'll complain about, but that's one of them.
